duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain facility cleanliness and perform building and equipment maintenance and repairs to company standards.
Perform machine installation, swap-outs, light fabrication projects, and office remodel/demolition projects.
Assist with essential and routine facility maintenance and repairs, including facility improvement projects.
Work with or assist contractors to complete projects or complex repairs.
Drive forklift and other facility vehicles, move furniture and materials, and perform maintenance on grounds and parking lots.
Be available for emergencies and weather-related events.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years of experience in facility maintenance and repair
